Review Text: Laura gave us the most incredible service and made our experience so wonderful!!

My hubby and I came in on a Saturday for happy hour with reservations.

Our server was Peter who immediately greeted us and offered us water.

We were so happy with his recommendation to get the calamari which was crispy and well seasoned.

Our beef carpaccio was delicious and had a small hiccup but Peter was quick to revolve the issue.

The oysters were so fresh and the shaved horseradish, cocktail sauce and mignonette go so well together.

Amazing, attentive and friendly service and top quality dishes at an excellent value will have us returning again and again!
Recommended dishes: Oysters on the Half Shell and Lemon Drop, Wagyu Beef Carpaccio, Calamari

Review Text: Sallie was an amazing server. Friendly, knowledgeable and very attentive to our table. Sallie made our dinner that much more enjoyable with her local knowledge of Canada
Very good food, amazing service by Peter! Will definitely come back

We go there for a happy hour. We had oysters each for 1.5 bucks, that's a steal. The food is so good, especially the oysters and mussels! The restaurant is a real treat. The service is great and I'd like to say a shoutout to Peter. Had a great time during our visit. I'd love to try more dishes next time!

We really enjoyed our time at Coast. Fresh sea food, good oysters, and the biggest surprise was the Fish & Chip cone. Service was also outstanding. Peter was our server, but the whole crew we interacted with was courteous.
Peter is the best! We had an unforgettable experience!
Stephen is a great server!

Our food is amazing and our server Stephen makes our experience in this restaurant even more amazing. He’s very friendly and professional. Me and my family will come back here next season and we’re hoping to have Stephen our server again.
Recommended dishes: Oysters on the Half Shell and Lemon Drop

Review Text: Came for the oysters and definitely satisfied! Went during the happy hour and every dish was excellent! Our server Stephen was amazing ! Will definitely come back!
Recommended dishes: Crab Dip, Oysters on the Half Shell and Lemon Drop, Calamari

Review Text: Had the most amazing Sunday lunch experience. Our server Stephen was perfect and took good care of us. The atmosphere was nice, they had a good playlist going but not too loud for chatting. And of course the food was top notch - perfectly seasoned and filling for the price. Will definitely be back.
No review text
Love the happy hour. Peter is the best!
Sam was amazing, the service and food was superb.
Our server Caili was so amazing! We came in to celebrate my birthday during happy hour and she made the whole experience so enjoyable. Great service!

Perfect!! Hands down, some of the most delicious food I've eaten lately! They utilize only the freshest ingredients and ensure that each dish is properly prepared. The Red Curry Mussels and Fish and Chips  was very memorable. Must try! I was really impressed by the service of Stephen and Jesse. The staff members were very knowledgable about the food and provided fantastic suggestions. Truly excellent service! Thank you

I’ve been here countless times and really enjoyed my experience every time! The food is great and the service is top tier! Big thank you to my regular server Sallie, for her hospitable and very attentive service, always meeting my food requests!
Stephen was a delight and made the experience a very enjoyable time!
Our server Stephen was awesome. Super friendly and nice to talk with while we enjoyed our happy hour.
Stephen was fantastic! Super friendly. The weekend happy hour was great - would recommend!

The room had a credit card and was paid for before I checked in, shouldn't have needed a deposit, was forced to give one and the room wasn't even clean. The walls were disgusting, bathroom, unclean, sheets, no idea, service, none. Please do better. Especially with your customer service who were working on Tuesday feb25.
No review text
Caili was the best server! Will for sure be back.
Caili is the best server!!
We were there for happy hour - food was amazing; atmosphere was great and the bar staff (Oscar, Jason, Ryan) were very attentive. Would highly recommend
Recommended dishes: Oysters on the Half Shell and Lemon Drop, Beef Carpaccio, Carpaccio

Review Text: Great service, Caili was fantastic. Seafood and wine was phenomenal.
We did a group dinner at coast and Laura was our server. She was excellent!

What a great place! From the moment we walked in, our waitress, Sallie, made us feel as if we had been a patron for years despite having only arrived from the UK the day before.
The atmosphere was very good and Sallie’s knowledge of the menu and her recommendations were excellent.
So good in fact that we have booked to go again tomorrow.
Can’t wait.
Recommended dishes: Oysters on the Half Shell and Lemon Drop, Coast

Review Text: Josh & Franklin are amazing. The service was exceptional. The food was so good. I would truly recommend Coast restaurant to my friends, family & hotel guests

My friend and I had exceptional service from our server Sallie. She knew when to check in on us and when to leave us alone. Despite arriving late she honoured us with a Happy Hour priced drink, and when she found out that my friend’s son got engaged that day she came with glasses of bubbly! We were not big paying clients but she treated us just the same! Thank you Sallie for your exceptional service, I hope to see you again soon.
